item.title: birthday wishes 78 Best Happy Birthday Wishes, Messages & Quotes for Your Friend
item.description: And as a good friend, you can’t let your friend’s birthday go by without giving them a heartfelt and inspiring birthday wish and message that could make their day really memorable. You simply can forget about cakes and gifts, but a genuine and sincere greeting can instantly make their special day the happiest. Best Happy Birthday Wishes and Messages for Your Friend As friends go, you’re not one of the best.
